data.actual_result: You don't get push notifications for pinned messages
data.expected_result: You should get push notification for pinned messages
data.short_description: No push notifications for pinned messages even though they are considered as user-sent message
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to any channel and ask your friend to pin any message in that channel, keep notifications settings to "all messages" so that you get push notifications for all messages - Press home screen just to minimize Discord while your friend pins a message in that channel
